reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice fabric weight, not sheer, drapes well. Flattering style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for the lower end of hight spectrum
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5 feet two. If I wanted gown this would’ve been perfect. It is lovely. It’s good material. It’s soft. It lays nicely. I was swimming in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible Quality, Just Beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This dress is exactly as described, and fits as expected. The color is a beautiful coral orange. The only thing that could make this dress better is pockets. It always amazes me when dress makers don't include them because every person who wears a dress wants them. The length on this dress is perfect on my 5'4" frame and doesn't require that I wear a heel, although it would like fine with high heels. You'll definitely need to wear a strapless bra but could get away with pasties, because the fabric isn't too sheer or revealing. The belt is a nice touch and can be worn at the front, back or side. I love the ruffles! This is a fantastic dress. You won't regret ordering it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dress is true to size. The material is smooth and has some weight to it. It is not really thick, but I would not describe it as lightweight. I like that the dress is not clingy, which makes it flattering. The garment is well made. The cost is a fair value for your money. The length and style of the dress are as pictured. I have gotten a few things from this brand, and I have been happy with all of them. I am pleased with this dress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfy and theres 4 colors to choose from.
reviews.reviewText: True to size: for me it's always a little stressful gettign clothes online so it alwys makes me happy and relievved when it fits like it should. i'm 5'1 and weigh aroudn 110lbs.value for money: this is totally worth the money when you buy it. the quality of the seamstress work is superb. the material is soft and feels great against your skin.overall: this beautiful dress is totally worth 5 stars and highly recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Per my wife.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered a medium and fits as such. She is super short, and this still does not drag the floor or get caught in her feet. Fabric is light but not sheer. Drapes as pictured. She is a bit aggravated by the sash. It doesn't stay tied well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Midi Halter Dress
reviews.reviewText: This dress is beautiful! It is long and flows. It is made of a thick chiffon-like polyester material and lined with a soft satin-like material. The halter neck has a button, that is easy to button and unbutton. The ruffles are so pretty and sewn on at an angle, adding interest and appeal. There is a slit on one side that goes to just above the knee. The tie belt is made of the same chiffon polyester material as the dress. This is nicer than the average sundress. The size is true to size, as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ehhh….could be better
reviews.reviewText: My measurements are 43-39-46 and I ordered a large. Dress may look better on others, or maybe I needed a larger size. Dress has no real shape, and material is rough. Slit doesn’t come up very high, and you get lost in the ruffles. Was really excited for this dress, and really hoped it would be an elegant dress for spring/summer.
